snippet: The Army War College rescinded a master’s degree awarded to John E. Walsh of Montana after determining that he had copied large portions of a paper.
abstract: Army War College rescinds master’s degree of Montana Sen John E Walsh after determining that Walsh plagiarized his final paper there in 2007.
lead_paragraph: The Army War College rescinded a master’s degree awarded to John E. Walsh of Montana after determining that he had copied large portions of a paper.

headline.main: Plagiarism Costs Degree for Senator John Walsh

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
